name: Jumpy Jump (alzhu1)
description:
Simple platformer made in 2 days. Arrow keys/WASD to move, Space to jump.

Art assets from Kenney Pixel Platformer: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer

Kenney font: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts

Sound effects used:

https://opengameart.org/content/plingy-coin

https://opengameart.org/content/completion-sound
